content: Hey Guys, is there a scheduled restart, such that hapi.fhir.org normally becomes unavailable? It's returning a 504 right now, and I think was also down about his time yesterday (or is this server simply being connectathon'd?)
... and back up! bulk data taking up all the RAM, see: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179167-hapi/topic/gateway.20timeouts.20on.20hapi.2Efhir.2Eorg
